mobiles.name: lord krotgar
mobiles.long_description: Lord Krotgar burada, nefretle gülümsüyor.
mobiles.description:
Krothgar, standing at over eight feet tall and clad in full spiked black
plate mail, is an imposing... man. It is said his fists have the power to
rend the very earth asunder if he is angered. It is small wonder the dark
powers have chosen him as their fell agent on Anon.

mobiles.name: ölüm þövalyesi
mobiles.long_description: Ölüm þövalyesi burada, þeytanca gülümsüyor.
mobiles.description:
This fellow and his comrades are servants of the demon lord Marmandes, and
will take only his orders, despite the fact that Krothgar could probably
crush him (and definitely them) with little effort. Krothgar tolerates their
presence in honor of the alliance he has forged with the dark powers to
facilitate the conquest of Anon.

mobiles.name: demir golem
mobiles.long_description: Demir bir golem görüyorsun, efendisinin düþmanlarýný parçalamaya hazýr!
mobiles.description:
This soulless automaton was created by Krothgar's fell scientist-mages to
serve him as a bodyguard (for appearance's sake only- he scarcely has need
of one) and an executioner. It will kill on a command.

mobiles.name: marmandes iblis prens
mobiles.long_description: Ýblis Prens Marmandes burada, seni izliyor!
mobiles.description:
Marmandes has been sent here by his evil masters to observe and aid their
servant Krothgar, and as such he will prefer to avoid direct combat, being
greatly weaker on this plane than on his native, and being eager to see how
Krothgar performs. This does not mean that he will fail to defend himself
to the best of his considerable abilities if the need arises.

mobiles.name: akstrak baþbüyücü
mobiles.long_description: Baþbüyücüyü görüyorsun, geliþini çýðlýklarla karþýlýyor!
mobiles.description:
This foul-tempered, evil man is Krothgar's magical assistant and adviser,
and in charge of the dark lord's impressive force of mages. He is infuriated
at your untimely interruption and reacts aggressively.

mobiles.name: yüksek rahip
mobiles.long_description: Karanlýðýn emrinde bir yüksek rahip görüyorsun, varlýðýndan rahatsýz oldu!
mobiles.description:
You have interrupted this foul priest of unspeakable gods during a very
critical ceremony! He is extremely angry, and so will his worshippers be...
He is a total fanatic and will battle to the death.

mobiles.name: seçkin muhafýz
mobiles.long_description: Seçkin bir muhafýz görüyorsun, varlýðýn onu tedirgin ediyor!
mobiles.description:
This fellow is clad in full body spiked black plate mail just like his lord,
and carries a HUGE spiked morning star, which he swings casually like it was
but a wooden stick. He cries out upon spotting you, and prepares for combat.

mobiles.name: destriyer
mobiles.long_description: Kara þövalyelerden birine ait olan bir destriyer görüyorsun.
mobiles.description:
This mammoth horse must weigh double any other equine steed you have ever
seen. Its jet black coat seems to glow with an inner evil, and you gasp in
astonishment at the satanic gleam in its dark red eyes.

mobiles.name: kara rahip
mobiles.long_description: Bir kara rahip görüyorsun, varlýðýný çýðlýklarla karþýlýyor!
mobiles.description:
This foul creature is one of the evil priests of the dark lord, and he is
keen to send your soul to him!

mobiles.name: kara büyücü
mobiles.long_description: Bir kara büyücü burada, gürleyerek rahatsýzlýðýný gösteriyor!
mobiles.description:
You have burst in at a very inappropriate time, and spoiled years of work.
Good ;)

However, the vile mage who is now drooling insanely seems a little upset...

mobiles.name: kara muhafýz
mobiles.long_description: Bir kara muhafýz görüyorsun, üzerine doðru ilerliyor.
mobiles.description:
This guard is a meber of the blackguard, the fanatical warriors who make up
the bulk of Lord Krothgar's evil army.

mobiles.name: kýzýl ejderha
mobiles.long_description: Kýzýl bir ejderha görüyorsun, seni parçalamaya hazýrlanýyor.
mobiles.description:
This dragon is one of Krothgar's five favorites, and is loyal to its master.
Huge teeth protrude from a mouth capable of spewing forth destructive matter
and baleful eyes gleam dangerously from above this maw directly at you. You
regret your intrusion.

mobiles.name: kara ejderha
mobiles.long_description: Kara bir ejderha görüyorsun, seni parçalamaya hazýrlanýyor.
mobiles.description:
This dragon is one of Krothgar's five favorites, and is loyal to its master.
Huge teeth protrude from a mouth capable of spewing forth destructive matter
and baleful eyes gleam dangerously from above this maw directly at you. You
regret your intrusion.

mobiles.name: beyaz ejderha
mobiles.long_description: Beyaz bir ejderha burada, seni yoketmeye hazýrlanýyor.
mobiles.description:
This dragon is one of Krothgar's five favorites, and is loyal to its master.
Huge teeth protrude from a mouth capable of spewing forth destructive matter
and baleful eyes gleam dangerously from above this maw directly at you. You
regret your intrusion.

mobiles.name: mavi ejderha
mobiles.long_description: Mavi bir ejderha görüyorsun, üzerine ilerliyor.
mobiles.description:
This dragon is one of Krothgar's five favorites, and is loyal to its master.
Huge teeth protrude from a mouth capable of spewing forth destructive matter
and baleful eyes gleam dangerously from above this maw directly at you. You
regret your intrusion.

mobiles.name: yeþil ejderha
mobiles.long_description: Yeþil bir ejderha görüyorsun, nefesinden çýkan ýsý derini yakýyor.
mobiles.description:
This dragon is one of Krothgar's five favorites, and is loyal to its master.
Huge teeth protrude from a mouth capable of spewing forth destructive matter
and baleful eyes gleam dangerously from above this maw directly at you. You
regret your intrusion.

mobiles.name: ateþ hizmetkarý
mobiles.long_description: Bir ateþ hizmetkarý görüyorsun, gördüðü herþeyi yakýyor.
mobiles.description: This magically-summoned being serves the mages of the tower- sometimes.

mobiles.name: efreti
mobiles.long_description: Bir efreti görüyorsun, demir sütunun üzerinde bekliyor.
mobiles.description:
This being, summoned from the Elemental Plane of Fire by the flask on the
floor, is not happy, for the power of the flask has been exhausted and he
has no way of returning home. He reacted by slaying first the summoner, and
now he will try to slay you!

mobiles.name: þedu
mobiles.long_description: Bir þedu görüyorsun, odanýn köþesinde duruyor.
mobiles.description:
This unfortunate creature was captured by agents of Krothgar, who brought it
here to amuse him. He occasionally spends time torturing it, but has grown
bored and will slay it soon.

mobiles.name: kara ilithid
mobiles.long_description: Kara ilithid burada, varlýðýný izliyor.
mobiles.description:
This foul mind flayer wants brains, and since Krothgar's followers aren't the
brightest of creatures it is near starvation. You are a nice surprise...

mobiles.name: zavallý köle
mobiles.long_description: Zavallý bir köle görüyorsun, kurban edilmeyi bekliyor.
mobiles.description:
This pathetic wretch has lost all hope. Squatting naked and shivering in the
corner of the cell he gibbers insanely and begs for mercy.

mobiles.name: zavallý köle
mobiles.long_description: Zavallý bir köle görüyorsun, Krotgar'ýn lejyonlarýna hizmet etmeyi bekliyor.
mobiles.description:
This pathetic wretch has lost all hope. Squatting naked and shivering in the
corner of the cell she gibbers insanely and begs for mercy.

mobiles.name: mutant
mobiles.long_description: Bir mutant görüyorsun, varlýðýný çýðlýklarla karþýlýyor.
mobiles.description:
These unnatural beings are foul products of the insane experiments of the
scientist mages upon captured slaves in an attempt to create the perfect
fighting race, an experiment finally realised in Korgthar's elite guard.
These failures have been condemned to a dismal life in the pits.

mobiles.name: hidra
mobiles.long_description: Oniki baþlý bir hidra görüyorsun.
mobiles.description:
This mighty creature has allied with Krothgar in exchange for a steady diet
of humans and elves. It will fight ferociously to defend the home of its
meal ticket.

mobiles.name: kuvasit
mobiles.long_description: Bir kuvasit görüyorsun, saldýrgan sesler çýkarýyor.
mobiles.description:
This angry creature is the familiar of some mage or another. It is angered
at being seen.

mobiles.name: sukubus
mobiles.long_description: Bir sukubus görüyorsun, seni baþtan çýkartýcý bir gülümsemeyle karþýlýyor.
mobiles.description:
This lustful demoness is the current concubine of Korgthar, though her
appetite is insatiable and she is always on the lookout for new prey... err
... lovers.

mobiles.name: toprak hizmetkarý
mobiles.long_description: Bir toprak hizmetkarý görüyorsun, gördüðü herþeyi yerle bir ediyor.
mobiles.description: This magically-summoned being serves the mages of the tower- sometimes.

mobiles.name: su hizmetkarý
mobiles.long_description: Bir su hizmetkarý görüyorsun, gördüðü herþeyi boðuyor.
mobiles.description: This magically-summoned being serves the mages of the tower- sometimes.

mobiles.name: hava hizmetkarý
mobiles.long_description: Bir hava hizmetkarý görüyorsun, gördüðü herþeyi parçalýyor.
mobiles.description: This magically-summoned being serves the mages of the tower- sometimes.

mobiles.name: cehennem tazýsý
mobiles.long_description: Bir cehennem tazýsý sana doðru koþuyor.
mobiles.description:
Breathing fire and reeking of brimstone, this unholy red-hued hound is indeed
a terrible sight to behold.

mobiles.name: ateþ devi
mobiles.long_description: Bir ateþ devi burada, kýlýcýný sana sallýyor.
mobiles.description:
These fellows are guardians of the massive volcano known as Mount Doom, upon
which rests the inpregnable fortress of their master, Lord Krothgar. They
fight fearlessly to defend it.

mobiles.name: buz devi
mobiles.long_description: Bir buz devi burada, donduran bakýþlarýyla seni izliyor.
mobiles.description:
These emissaries are here to form an alliance with the forces of Mount Doom.
They do not take kindly to intrusions.

mobiles.name: dað devi
mobiles.long_description: Bir dað devi seni izliyor.
mobiles.description:
These fellows are guardians of the lands surrounding the massive volcano
known as Mount Doom, upon which rests the inpregnable fortress of their
master, Lord Krothgar. They fight fearlessly to defend it.

mobiles.name: bulut devi
mobiles.long_description: Bir bulut devi küçümseyici bakýþlarla seni izliyor.
mobiles.description:
These emissaries are here to form an alliance with the forces of Mount Doom.
They do not take kindly to intrusions.

mobiles.name: ogre
mobiles.long_description: Bir ogre burada, devlere hizmet ediyor.
mobiles.description:
This fellow may seem huge to you, but by giant standards he's a veritable
runt, as they never cease to point out to him as he makes his way about,
serving food and drinks in between kicks to the head.

mobiles.name: ogre büyücü
mobiles.long_description: Bir ogre büyücü seni dikkatle izliyor.
mobiles.description:
These eastern cousins of the ogres and giants of the west have been invited
here to form an alliance with the troops of Krothgar. They are deeply
suspicious of the arrangement, however, and view all comers with the same
degree of caution, but not aggression.

mobiles.name: asura
mobiles.long_description: Bir asura görüyorsun, gürültüyle esniyor.
mobiles.description:
These grotesques were bred for combat, not sentry duty, and the boredom is
almost killing them. They don't even notice your presence.

mobiles.name: ethin
mobiles.long_description: Bir ethin görüyorsun, iki kafasýyla seni izliyor.
mobiles.description:
This two-headed giant is a guard of the more important inhabitants of the
fortress. He takes his duties very seriously.

mobiles.name: þef suikastçi
mobiles.long_description: Bir suikastçi görüyorsun, eli silahýnda seni izliyor.
mobiles.description:
This beauty is actually the lethal head of Krothgar's elite assassins, who
have achieved more for his cause than a dozen armies. She asks for no quarter,
and nor does she give any herself.

mobiles.name: suikastçi
mobiles.long_description: Bir suikastçi dövüþe hazýrlanýyor.
mobiles.description:
This woman is a member of Krothgar's assassin company, and has slain more
men and women than any one hundred of his regular soldiers.

mobiles.name: karayel elçi
mobiles.long_description: Bir karayel elçi seni izliyor.
mobiles.description:
This priestess is here to secure an alliance between her people and Krothgar's
forces. She is not happy about your intrusion into this matter.

mobiles.name: yeþil gul
mobiles.long_description: Yeþil renkli bir gul seni izliyor.
mobiles.description: This beast is a servant of the hill giants who patrol the plains of Doom.

mobiles.name: gul
mobiles.long_description: Kana susamýþ bir gul görüyorsun, seni izliyor.
mobiles.description: This hideous undead wants to feast on your flesh!

mobiles.name: vampir
mobiles.long_description: Bir vampir sana gülümsüyor...
mobiles.description:
This vamp is treacherous and deadly. You can see why Krothgar likes having
her around...

mobiles.name: kadim liç
mobiles.long_description: Kadim bir liç düþüncelerinden sýyrýlýp sana bakýyor.
mobiles.description:
Even the mages of Krothgar know not of the existence of this secret tomb.
Buried within is the old lord of the Fortress, who was imprisoned in here
by the forces of Good ages ago. And now you have woken him up. Way to go
slick.

mobiles.name: taþ golem
mobiles.long_description: Bir taþ golem burada, efendisinin düþmanlarýný yoketmeye hazýr!
mobiles.description:
This soulless automaton was created by Krothgar's fell evil priests to
serve him as a bodyguard (for appearance's sake only- he scarcely has need
of one) and an executioner. It will kill on a command.

mobiles.name: bekçi
mobiles.long_description: Bir bekçi görüyorsun, tüm nefretiyle seni izliyor.

mobiles.name: prenses pardus
mobiles.long_description: Prenses Pardus'u görüyorsun, seni izliyor!
mobiles.description:
This snake with a woman's head seems unimpressed by your intrusion, but
she refrains from attacking, hoping that the guards of the castle will see
to you so she doesn't have to expend energy fighting.

objects.name: çift-el kýlýç
objects.description: Bir çift elli kýlýç burada duruyor.

objects.name: atevli tomruk
objects.description: Üzerinde alevlerin oynaþtýðý kocaman bir tomruk görüyorsun.

objects.name: büyülü toz þiþesi
objects.description: Bir büyülü toz þiþesi burada yatýyor.

objects.name: ejderha zýrhý
objects.description: Büyük bir ejderha zýrhý burada düþürülmüþ.

objects.name: ejderha pençesi
objects.description: Bir çift ejderha pençesi burada býrakýlmýþ.

objects.name: tunç asa
objects.description: Tunçtan yapýlmýþ bir asa burada dinleniyor.

objects.name: aðaç saplý gürz
objects.description: Aðaç saplý bir gürz burada yatýyor.

objects.name: büyülü iksir þiþe
objects.description: Büyülü bir iksir þiþesi yerde duruyor.

objects.name: karayel çizme
objects.description: Bir çift karayel çizmesi burada býrakýlmýþ.

objects.name: karayel örgülü zýrhý
objects.description: Bir karayel örgülü zýrhý burada unutulmuþ.

objects.name: dokunaç kýrbaç
objects.description: Dokunaçlarla örülmüþ bir kýrbaç burada unutulmuþ.

objects.name: anahtar
objects.description: Üst seviyelere çýkmaya yarayacak bir anahtar burada býrakýlmýþ.

rooms.name: Hüküm Daðý Düzlükleri Yakýnýnda
rooms.description:
You are heading directly toward Mount Doom, on a narrow path that leads to
the desolate, monster-infested plains that surround it. This is the fell
domain of Lord Krothgar, whose forbidding black fortress can be seen atop the
peak of the extinct volcano called by humans Mount Doom. Armies of giants
patrol the lower slopes, while evil mutants, mages and demons guard the
fortress itself. Steeling yourself, you push on.

rooms.name: Hüküm Daðý Düzlükleri
rooms.description:
Terkedilmiþ topraklarda esen soðuk rüzgar içini donduruyor. Sert toprak
zeminin üzerine saçýlmýþ eski maceracýlarýn kemikleri, paslanmýþ silahlar
ve diþlere benzeyen küçük taþ parçalarý görüyorsun. Sanki bu eski dünya
onlarý yemiþ ve sindirmiþ, kalan parçalarý da etrafa saçmýþ gibi. Aniden
bir gulun ulumasý ile etrafý incele iþinden vazgeçiyorsun.

rooms.name: Hüküm Daðý Düzlükleri
rooms.description:
Terkedilmiþ topraklarda esen soðuk rüzgar içini donduruyor. Sert toprak
zeminin üzerine saçýlmýþ eski maceracýlarýn kemikleri, paslanmýþ silahlar

onlarý yemiþ ve sindirmiþ, kalan parçalarý da etrafa saçmýþ gibi. Aniden
bir gulun ulumasý ile etrafý incele iþinden vazgeçiyorsun.

rooms.name: Hüküm Daðý Tepeleri
rooms.description:
Daðýn yamacýndasýn. Buradan daðýn doruklarýna ya da ürkütücü düzlüklere
devam edebilirsin. Burada zemin oldukça kayalýk ve emniyetsiz. Yerde
volkanik basýncýn yarattýðý çatlaklar ve granit kaya yapýlarý görüyorsun.
Düzlüklerdekine göre daha sert esen bir rüzgarla karþý karþýyasýn. Ulumalar
ve çýðlýklar duyuyorsun.

rooms.name: Hüküm Daðý Tepeleri
rooms.description:
Daðýn yamacýndasýn. Buradan daðýn doruklarýna ya da ürkütücü düzlüklere

rooms.name: Hüküm Daðý Düzlükleri
rooms.description:
Terkedilmiþ topraklarda esen soðuk rüzgar içini donduruyor. Sert toprak

Daðýn yamacýndasýn. Buradan daðýn doruklarýna ya da ürkütücü düzlüklere

Düzlüklerdekine göre daha sert esen bir rüzgarla karþý karþýyasýn. Ulumalar

Zirvenin yakýnlarýnda dönüp duruyorsun. Zemin tepelere göre daha

aþaðýlarda yaþayan yaratýklar yukarýdakiler yanýnda oldukça önemsiz

rooms.name: Lord Korgtar Ýstihkamýnýn Dýþý
rooms.description:
You have finally reached the summit, and are standing beneath the gates of
the Fortress, which you may climb up to by means of an iron staircase. You
can sense many pairs of eyes upon you, and you wonder how far you will be
permitted to go before Korgthar's forces combine and crush you.

rooms.name: Hüküm Daðý Bayýrlarý

rooms.name: Ýstihkamýn Ýçi
rooms.description:
You are standing inside the gates of the fortress, at a crossroads. The
passages are remarkably plain for a den of evil- simply dressed grey flag
stones on floor and walls, the monotony broken only by the occasional torch
sconce or tattered tapestry. It is evident that this castle has known many
inhabitants prior to its current ones.

rooms.name: Hücre Bloðu
rooms.description:
Here the prisoner of Krogthar are kept. There are not many cells, as the
Lord Korgthar is not fond of taking prisoners (hassles, hassles...). If
you think security is a little lax, think of what lurks outside to deter
potentianl escapees...

rooms.name: Hücre
rooms.description:
A dank, dismal affair with little in the way of bedding or toilet facilities.
The stench is actually quite horrendous and you find yourself eager to leave.

rooms.name: Hücre
rooms.description:
A dank, dismal affair with little in the way of bedding or toilet facilities.
The stench is actually quite horrendous and you find yourself eager to leave.

rooms.name: Hücre Bloðu
rooms.description:
Here the prisoner of Krogthar are kept. There are not many cells, as the
Lord Korgthar is not fond of taking prisoners (hassles, hassles...). If
you think security is a little lax, think of what lurks outside to deter
potentianl escapees...

rooms.name: Hücre
rooms.description:
A dank, dismal affair with little in the way of bedding or toilet facilities.
The stench is actually quite horrendous and you find yourself eager to leave.

rooms.name: Hücre
rooms.description:
A dank, dismal affair with little in the way of bedding or toilet facilities.
The stench is actually quite horrendous and you find yourself eager to leave.

rooms.name: Hücre
rooms.description:
A dank, dismal affair with little in the way of bedding or toilet facilities.
The stench is actually quite horrendous and you find yourself eager to leave.

rooms.name: Karargahlar
rooms.description:
You are standing before a solid wooden door that leads to the quarters of
some of the many types of troops that serve Krothgar.

rooms.name: Antre Odasý
rooms.description:
You are standing in a well-furnished anteroom with doors leading in all four
directions. No noise comes from behind any- they are quite solid and are
effectively soundproof.

rooms.name: Suikastçilerin Karargahý
rooms.description:
In this room reside some of the assassins that serve Korthgar. He may not
be the brightest of tyrants, but Krothgar was smart enough to work out it was
easier to send a single assassin to slay a king and collapse an empire than
it was to conquer it by brute force. His assassins live in comfort, as he
values them highly.

rooms.name: Þef Suikastçinin Karargahý
rooms.description:
You have entered the quarters of the Chief of Krothgar's ruthlessly
efficient assassins, and caught her in flagrante delicto with two naked men
strapped to racks. She swears and draws her swords, making no attempt to
cover herself, slaying her slaves before moving to confront you.

rooms.name: Suikastçilerin Karargahý
rooms.description:
In this room reside some of the assassins that serve Korthgar. He may not
be the brightest of tyrants, but Krothgar was smart enough to work out it was
easier to send a single assassin to slay a king and collapse an empire than
it was to conquer it by brute force. His assassins live in comfort, as he
values them highly.

rooms.name: Karargahlar
rooms.description:
You are standing before a solid wooden door that leads to the quarters of
some of the many types of troops that serve Krothgar.

rooms.name: Koridor
rooms.description:
You are advancing along a dark corridor that leads to the quarters of Lord
Krothgar's blackguard.

rooms.name: Bekçinin Odasý
rooms.description:
Here resides the keeper of the Mutant Pit, where the failed experiments of
the scientist mages are kept to do away with prisoners or insolent guards.
He likes his job, and isn't about to let you hurt his mutants.

rooms.name: Mutant Merkezi
rooms.description:
Ack! You're in the mutant pit! Surrounded by gore, excrement, mucous, vomit
and the remains of dying mutants, you gag and choke and struggle to get out,
only to find your way blocked by several mutants...

rooms.name: Koridor
rooms.description:
You are advancing along a dark corridor that leads to the quarters of Lord
Krothgar's blackguard.

rooms.name: Muhafýz Umumi Odasý
rooms.description:
Doors lead in all directions from this messy rec room. Blood, beer and food
stain the straw-covered floor while decomposing human, orc and ogre corpse
hang from hooks in the ceiling, evidently used as practice dummies.

exits.description: This door reads- "Upper level access. Authorised personnel only!

rooms.name: Muhafýz Karargahý
rooms.description:
This rooms is full of messy bunks and snoring guards. Dice and cards are
scattered across the filthy stone floor, and rats gnaw at the boots of the
guards.

rooms.name: Muhafýz Karargahý
rooms.description:
This rooms is full of messy bunks and snoring guards. Dice and cards are
scattered across the filthy stone floor, and rats gnaw at the boots of the
guards.

rooms.name: Misafir Bölümü
rooms.description:
Down this southern corridor lie the guest rooms, where the many emissaries
from the powerful races Krothgar is attempting to gain as allies currently
reside. They frown upon intruders...

rooms.name: Misafir Bölümü
rooms.description:
Down this southern corridor lie the guest rooms, where the many emissaries
from the powerful races Krothgar is attempting to gain as allies currently
reside. They frown upon intruders...

rooms.name: Misafir Bölümü
rooms.description:
These quarters are well-decorated, with well-preserved tapestries and rugs,
and carved wooden furniture. Alliances with other powers are crucial to
Krothgar's plans, and he is doing his best to impress his diabolical guests.

rooms.name: Misafir Bölümü
rooms.description:
These quarters are well-decorated, with well-preserved tapestries and rugs,
and carved wooden furniture. Alliances with other powers are crucial to
Krothgar's plans, and he is doing his best to impress his diabolical guests.

rooms.name: Misafir Bölümü
rooms.description:
Down this southern corridor lie the guest rooms, where the many emissaries
from the powerful races Krothgar is attempting to gain as allies currently
reside. They frown upon intruders...

rooms.name: Misafir Bölümü
rooms.description:
These quarters are well-decorated, with well-preserved tapestries and rugs,
and carved wooden furniture. Alliances with other powers are crucial to
Krothgar's plans, and he is doing his best to impress his diabolical guests.

rooms.name: Misafir Bölümü
rooms.description:
These quarters are well-decorated, with well-preserved tapestries and rugs,
and carved wooden furniture. Alliances with other powers are crucial to
Krothgar's plans, and he is doing his best to impress his diabolical guests.

rooms.name: Misafir Bölümü
rooms.description:
These quarters are well-decorated, with well-preserved tapestries and rugs,
and carved wooden furniture. Alliances with other powers are crucial to
Krothgar's plans, and he is doing his best to impress his diabolical guests.

rooms.name: Ýstihkam
rooms.description:
You have entered the restricted area. Staircases run up and down from here,
and a narrow passage stretches away to the west.

rooms.name: Dar Koridor
rooms.description:
This corridor runs through the center of the Fortress to the mage towers,
on the western wall of the fortress. A junction lies to the west.

rooms.name: Kesiþim
rooms.description:
You may head through doors to the north or south from here, or back east
to the outer fortress. There is a sign on the south door, and a plaque on
the northern.

extra_descriptions.description:
The sign reads-

        The Quarters of the Archmage. Please do not enter. Important
        experiment in progress. Leave messages with the guards.

        - Axtraxes.

The plaque reads-

       "T H E   E L E M E N T A L   L A B O R A T O R I E S "

       Keep out!

       - Axtraxes.

rooms.name: Baþbüyücü Karargahý
rooms.description:
You have barged into the quarters of Axtraxes, arch mage of Krothgar, and
ruined his experiment. He's BOUND to be upset.

rooms.name: Hizmetkar Laboratuvarlarý
rooms.description:
This vast room extends in all directions. You see vats, urns, beakers, jars,
alembics and a hundred other items scattered about on desks, benches, chairs
and floors. Everything appears rather damaged, as if someone (or something)
has recently gone berserk in here...

rooms.name: Laboratuvarýn Batý Sonu
rooms.description:
This vast room extends in all directions. You see vats, urns, beakers, jars,
alembics and a hundred other items scattered about on desks, benches, chairs
and floors. Everything appears rather damaged, as if someone (or something)
has recently gone berserk in here...

rooms.name: Laboratuvarýn Kuzey Sonu
rooms.description:
This vast room extends in all directions. You see vats, urns, beakers, jars,
alembics and a hundred other items scattered about on desks, benches, chairs
and floors. Everything appears rather damaged, as if someone (or something)
has recently gone berserk in here...

rooms.name: Laboratuvarýn Doðu Sonu
rooms.description:
This vast room extends in all directions. You see vats, urns, beakers, jars,
alembics and a hundred other items scattered about on desks, benches, chairs
and floors. Everything appears rather damaged, as if someone (or something)
has recently gone berserk in here...

rooms.name: Alt Odalar
rooms.description:
You have entered the lower levels of the Fortress, where hideous creatures
lurk and evil priests engage in foul ceremonies to their demonic deities.

rooms.name: Yeraltý Türbesi
rooms.description:
This crypt has remained untouched for centuries. It houses the remains of
the foul lich king who once ruled this Fortress and much of the surrounding
land under an iron fist (literally, Krothgar's golem now wears it). You
better hope he stayed dead...

rooms.name: Lanetli Tapýnak
rooms.description:
You have entered the grounds of the unholy temple of the Fortress. Screaming
virgins are torn asunder in foul rituals upon altars soaked with the blood
of thousands of innocents while evil priests look on and pray for a visitation
from their gods.

rooms.name: Lanetli Tapýnak
rooms.description:
You have entered the grounds of the unholy temple of the Fortress. Screaming
virgins are torn asunder in foul rituals upon altars soaked with the blood
of thousands of innocents while evil priests look on and pray for a visitation
from their gods.

The altar is directly before you, and you see the high priest standing
behind it, about to sacrifice another virgin.

rooms.name: Lanetli Tapýnak
rooms.description:
You have entered the grounds of the unholy temple of the Fortress. Screaming
virgins are torn asunder in foul rituals upon altars soaked with the blood
of thousands of innocents while evil priests look on and pray for a visitation
from their gods. Down from here lairs Jher, ally of Krogthar.

rooms.name: Hidra Ýni
rooms.description:
Here Krothgar keeps his hydra, which guards the treasure of the evil temple.
It is a wild and ferocious beast, which will tear apart anything that enters
its lair save Krothgar or the high priest.

rooms.name: Sarmal Merdiven
rooms.description:
You are ascending a spiral staircase that winds up into the heights of the
multitude of towers that adorn the heights of the Fortress.

rooms.name: Merdiven Sahanlýðý
rooms.description:
You have come to a landing, upon which are 4 doors leading in the cardinal
directions. The staircase continues its climb in the center.

rooms.name: Yatak Odasý
rooms.description:
You have entered a luxurious boudoir full of expensive furniture and a wide
variety of perfumes, unguents and other cosmetics. Piles of clothing are
piled on the floor, as if someone had but recently gone through them in
search of an outfit.

rooms.name: Yatak Odasý
rooms.description:
You have entered a luxurious boudoir full of expensive furniture and a wide
variety of perfumes, unguents and other cosmetics. Piles of clothing are
piled on the floor, as if someone had but recently gone through them in
search of an outfit.

rooms.name: Yemek Salonu
rooms.description:
You have entered a long dining hall filled with a huge table lined with
high-backed chairs. Seated in these chairs are skeletons (the normal sort)
clad in royal regalia- these are the many opponents that Krothgar has
vanquished. He keeps their mortal remains here as trophies.

rooms.name: Yatak Odasý
rooms.description:
You have entered a luxurious boudoir full of expensive furniture and a wide
variety of perfumes, unguents and other cosmetics. Piles of clothing are
piled on the floor, as if someone had but recently gone through them in
search of an outfit.

rooms.name: Sarmal Merdiven
rooms.description:
You are ascending a spiral staircase that winds up into the heights of the
multitude of towers that adorn the heights of the Fortress.

rooms.name: Taht Odasý
rooms.description:
You have entered the Throne Room of Lord Krothgar. He sits here, upon his
throne, located in the center of the 5 towers which emerge in all directions
from this room. In each tower resides a powerful dragon, loyal allies of the
Lord. Long wall hangings depict the many victories won by Krothgar, and
in between them stand members of his elite guard, ready to defend their lord.

rooms.name: Ejderha Kulesi
rooms.description:
In this tower rests a huge dragon, the largest of its kind. It will not
appreciate being disturbed by a mortal such as yourself...

rooms.name: Ejderha Kulesi
rooms.description:
In this tower rests a huge dragon, the largest of its kind. It will not
appreciate being disturbed by a mortal such as yourself...

rooms.name: Ejderha Kulesi
rooms.description:
In this tower rests a huge dragon, the largest of its kind. It will not
appreciate being disturbed by a mortal such as yourself...

rooms.name: Ejderha Kulesi
rooms.description:
In this tower rests a huge dragon, the largest of its kind. It will not
appreciate being disturbed by a mortal such as yourself...

rooms.name: Ejderha Kulesi
rooms.description:
In this tower rests a huge dragon, the largest of its kind. It will not
appreciate being disturbed by a mortal such as yourself...

rooms.name: Ahýr
rooms.description:
Here, the blackguard keep their steeds, evil destriers bred on the plains
of Hel itself.
